name: Cobi Summer Sports
description:
On your marks and get ready to run, jump and play!

How fast can you run? How far can you jump? How far can you throw? Can you beat world records and challenge the best?

Have great fun as you compete against yourself or play with your friends to see who's the best athletics champ.

Use global leaderboards to see how good you are or compete with your friends in Messages.

Get ready to compete in the following,
• 100m
• Long Jump
• Javelin
• 200m
• Shot Put
• Triple Jump
• Hurdles

So get set and let's go run, jump and play!

Cobi Summer Sports, from the creators of Red's Kingdom, Let's Go Rocket and the smash-hit iMessage games Cobi Arrows, Cobi Shoot and Cobi Hoops.

More
Discover more amazing Cobra Mobile games at www.cobramobile.com

Support
Having problems? Visit www.cobramobile.com/support to see if we can help
